Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39742 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-39742 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package giflib is earlier than 5.2.1-8, affected by CVE-2023-39742
